MATLAB Physical Analysis of the Gridded Ocean (MAPAGO)¶

Introduction¶

General description¶

This document describes the MATLAB version of the “Physical Analysis of Gridded Ocean”.

This set of programs aims at comparing the temperature, salinity and velocity fields of gridded ocean models along pre-defined sections.

See Download to get sources, inputs data for tests and documentations.
